name: Blaster Boys
description:
This is a silly little space shooter game. It's pretty basic (one of my first game maker titles) so don't expect anything ground breaking, but check it out and tell me what you think I should add to the game!

You play as a member of the BBI (Blaster Boys Initiative) And you patrol the skies for aliens and blow em up.

Hit me up on Twitter @JordanOloman or my email jordan.oloman@hotmail.co.uk

To-Do List

- It's called Blaster Boys so we need some more boys with different laser types, ships etc. Working on that

- More enemy types/ more levels/ difficulty scaling

- I want to add a little trading post between levels where you can use your score to buy upgrades. Working on that too
